item.title: Geek in Chinese Characters - Green/Pink Space Design
item.description: Geek typically refers to experts, enthusiasts or persons obsessed with a hobby. Take pride in being a geek with this cool design. It shows the word “geek” in Simplified Chinese characters in a lucid green with pink stars shining through. •...

item.title: RTFM - Read The Fine Manual Brown Western Style Design
item.description: RTFM is an acronym that can mean “Read The Fine Manual”, but the F is typically expanded to a more expressive word, especially when uttered by annoyed IT staff. / This design shows the initialism RTFM in a western style font. Suitable for...

item.title: 1337 - Leet Geek/Hacker Digital Clock Style Black Text
item.description: 1337 is leetspeak for leet, an alternative alphabet used primarily on the Internet. This type of slang was initially used exclusively by software hackers and script kiddies, but is more widely understood by now. / This design with the text...

item.title: RTFM - Western Style Black Font Design for Computer Geeks
item.description: RTFM is an initialism for the expression “read the fucking manual” or more in the context of the Unix computer operating system, “read the fucking man page”. / RTFM is usually expressed when the speaker is irritated by another...
